data.title: Long Beach State University Athletics
data.meta_description: Jason Hart Jr. (5) Guard - LONG BEACH STATE (2022-23): Played in five games in November before missing the rest of the season as a medical redshirt … Saw a s...
data.text:
LONG BEACH STATE (2022-23): Played in five games in November before missing the rest of the season as a medical redshirt … Saw a season-high seven minutes played against St. Katherine.

HIGH SCHOOL: Began his high school career by earning CIF City Section of the Year honors … Named First Team all-league after averaging 12.0 points and 3.4 assists per game … Averaged 16 points and 5 assists per game as a sophomore in 2020 … Returned following the COVID-19 pause with an outstanding senior season … Helped lead St. Bernard to the CIF D1 Southern Section championship as a senior … Scored 28 points in the championship game, making six 3-pointers … Named the tournament MVP … A First Team All-CIF selection … Graduated Summa Cum Laude from St. Bernard.

PERSONAL: Major is undeclared … Father Jason Hart was a standout player for Syracuse before playing nine years in the NBA.

CAREER HIGHS

Rebounds: 1, vs. North Texas, 11/26/22

Assists: 1, vs. Vermont, 11/27/22

Minutes: 7, vs. St. Katherine, 11/19/22
